guest_info.name: Hubert Johnson
guest_info.title: Tax Attorney
guest_info.specialty: Tax debt resolution and IRS negotiations

main_topics: Tax issues affecting real estate transactions
Offer in compromise with the IRS

problems_addressed.specific_problem: REALTORS' clients unable to buy or sell due to tax liens
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Set up installment agreements with the IRS to enable property transactions.
Incorporate to protect personal assets and potentially save on taxes.

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Clients facing property seizure due to tax issues
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Work with a tax attorney to negotiate with the IRS and prevent seizure.

target_avatars.relevance: This episode provides strategies for REALTORS whose clients face tax issues that hinder transactions.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Understanding tax lien resolutions can unlock more sales opportunities.

target_avatars.relevance: Offers insights into protecting personal assets and enhancing business operations through incorporation.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Incorporating can provide financial and legal benefits that support long-term growth.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: Helping people to pay less in taxes is one of the most patriotic things you can do.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: It's a provocative statement that challenges common perceptions about taxes.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Why paying less in taxes might be the most patriotic act.

clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: The dramatic reduction in tax debt is attention-grabbing and demonstrates expertise.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: How one client reduced their tax debt from $249,000 to just $20.

key_tactics.tactic: Set up installment agreements with the IRS for clients with tax liens.
key_tactics.context: To enable clients to proceed with buying or selling property.
To protect personal assets and potentially reduce tax liabilities.

quotable_insights: Nobody pays a dollar more in taxes than they want to or that they ought to.
Helping people to pay less in taxes is one of the most patriotic things you can do.

resources_mentioned.name: Guardian Tax Law
resources_mentioned.context: Hubert's law firm specializing in tax debt resolution.

resources_mentioned.name: Real Geeks
resources_mentioned.context: Sponsor of the podcast, offering tools for real estate agents.

episode_summary: In this episode, tax attorney Hubert Johnson discusses how REALTORS can assist clients with tax liens to facilitate property transactions. He emphasizes the importance of incorporating as a business to protect personal assets and offers insights into negotiating with the IRS to resolve tax debts. Hubert shares success stories and practical advice for REALTORS facing clients with tax-related roadblocks.
